document.docAuthor: Menzel, Frank, Smith, Jane E. & Chandler, Peter J.

document.masterDocTitle: The sciarid fauna of the British Isles (Diptera: Sciaridae), including descriptions of six new species

subSubSection.paragraph:

Ecological notes : found in broad-leaved and carr woodland; humid heathland; wetlands including fen, reed and sedge beds, acidic mire, wet meadows and saltmarsh; former gravel workings. vi–x.

Taxonomic note : As well as the listed types for
Bradysia semantica
from Laurence (1994: 114) , 2 further examples from the location ‘Hickling, Norfolk’ with the dates 23.vi.−7.vii.1988 [1] and 22.viii.1988 [1] were found in Laurence’s collection in another box. These do not belong to the type series for
Bradysia semantica
.
